Chat.thisMessageWasNotSavedPleaseTryTheChatAg: This message was not saved. Please try the chat again.

Greeting.goodNight: Good night, {name} is ready, keep learning and rest
Greeting.letMeKnowWhenYoureReadyToBegin: I am {name}, let me know when you're ready to begin.
Greeting.whereWouldYouLikeToStart: Language assistant {name} is online, where would you like to start?

presets.introduce: Please introduce yourself, what can you help me with?
presets.workplaceEnglish: I want to learn workplace English, please output a workplace English passage
presets.oralExpression: How to improve oral expression ability, please output an oral expression passage
presets.basicDialogue: I have no foundation, please help me generate a basic English dialogue, within 200 words

Tool.autoToolModeDescription: Auto decide when to use tools, without asking you
Tool.manualToolModeDescription: Ask for your permission before using any tools
Tool.noneToolModeDescription: Do not use tools. @mention is still available.
Tool.toolsSetupDescription:
Select the tools that can be used.
AI will use the selected tools according to its own judgment.

You can also force the use of specific tools through @mention.

LearnMode.title: Learn Mode
LearnMode.description: In learn mode, you will get more detailed explanations and richer learning content.
LearnMode.learnModeCloseDescription: After closing learn mode, you will return to normal mode.
